author: Daily Express
title: Ground News - Lawyers seek police investigation into Post Office executives
text:
Summary by Daily Express Lawyers representing victims of the Post Office Horizon scandal are urging a thorough police investigation into senior staff members accused of a cover-up. Share menu More
